snippet: To save the Postal Service, Congress must agree on a sensible reform plan that includes tough changes.
abstract: Editorial urges the House and Senate to come to an agreement on a sensible reform plan for the United States Postal Service, before it goes bankrupt.
lead_paragraph: To save the Postal Service, Congress must agree on a sensible reform plan that includes tough changes.

headline.seo: Capitol Hill, Slower Than Snail Mail
headline.main: Capitol Hill, Slower Than Snail Mail
headline.print_headline: Capitol Hill, Slower Than Snail Mail
